QuestData.Title: A Poisonous Palette
QuestData.Description:
I may not be great at my job, but at least I paid attention when I was learning how to do it. Every Waywatcher worth her scales knows how to make a proper antidote. I just need enough poison to mix it properly.
Nori said the tarasek who attacked her had spears coated with the stuff. Find them and bring their spears to me. If my hunch is correct, I'll be able to make an antidote with the residue from the spearheads.
I just hope we have enough time.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Alvi takes the spears that you gathered. She carefully scrapes her dagger across one of the blades, removing a film of sticky, sickly sap.>
It's just as I thought. Thank you, $n. This should be enough for an antidote, and I even think I know where the poison is coming from.
